targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  TOP(50)
  COUNT(*) as 'Total Sessions',
  NULL as 'Machines In Failure',
  NULL as 'Failed Sessions'
FROM
  CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Session
WHERE
  EndDate IS NULL
GROUP BY
  IsAnonymous
UNION
SELECT
  TOP(50)
  NULL as 'Total Sessions',
  COUNT(*) as 'Machines In Failure',
  NULL as 'Failed Sessions'
FROM
  CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.MachineFailureLog
WHERE
  FailureEndDate IS NULL
UNION
SELECT
  TOP(50)
  NULL as 'Total Sessions',
  NULL as 'Machines In Failure',
  COUNT(*) as 'Failed Sessions'
FROM
  CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.ConnectionFailureLog
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(FailureDate)

SELECT (
  SELECT
    COUNT(*) 
  FROM
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Machine m,
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Catalog c
  WHERE
    m.CatalogId = c.Id AND
    m.LifecycleState = 0 AND
    c.SessionSupport = 1
) 'Machines',
(
  SELECT
    COUNT(*) 
  FROM
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Machine m,
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Catalog c
  WHERE
    m.CatalogId = c.Id AND
    m.LifecycleState = 0 AND
    c.SessionSupport = 1 AND
    m.CurrentSessionCount > 0
) 'Sessions',
(
  SELECT
    COUNT(*)
  FROM
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Machine m,
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Catalog c
  WHERE
    m.CatalogId = c.Id AND
    m.LifecycleState = 0 AND
    c.SessionSupport = 1 AND
    m.CurrentSessionCount = 0
) 'Available',
(
  SELECT
    COUNT(*)
  FROM
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Machine m,
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Catalog c
  WHERE
    m.CatalogId = c.Id AND
    m.LifecycleState = 0 AND
    c.SessionSupport = 1 AND
    m.CurrentRegistrationState = 1
) 'Registered',
(
  SELECT
    COUNT(*)
  FROM
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Machine m,
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Catalog c
  WHERE
    m.CatalogId = c.Id AND
    m.LifecycleState = 0 AND
    c.SessionSupport = 1 AND
    m.CurrentRegistrationState <> 1
) 'Unregistered',
(
  SELECT
    COUNT(*)
  FROM
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Machine m,
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Catalog c
  WHERE
    m.CatalogId = c.Id AND
    m.LifecycleState = 0 AND
    c.SessionSupport = 1 AND
    m.IsInMaintenanceMode = 1
) 'IsInMaintenanceMode'

SELECT (
  SELECT
    COUNT(*) 
  FROM
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Machine m,
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Catalog c
  WHERE
    m.CatalogId = c.Id AND
    m.LifecycleState = 0 AND
    c.SessionSupport = 2
) 'Machines',
(
  SELECT
    SUM(m.CurrentSessionCount) 
  FROM
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Machine m,
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Catalog c
  WHERE
    m.CatalogId = c.Id AND
    m.LifecycleState = 0 AND
    c.SessionSupport = 2
) 'Sessions',
(
  SELECT
    SUM(l.EffectiveLoadIndex) / COUNT(*)
  FROM
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Machine m,
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Catalog c,
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.LoadIndex l
  WHERE
    m.CatalogId = c.Id AND
    m.CurrentLoadIndexId = l.Id AND
    m.LifecycleState = 0 AND
    c.SessionSupport = 2
) 'Load Index',
(
  SELECT
    COUNT(*)
  FROM
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Machine m,
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Catalog c
  WHERE
    m.CatalogId = c.Id AND
    m.LifecycleState = 0 AND
    c.SessionSupport = 2 AND
    m.CurrentRegistrationState = 1
) 'Registered',
(
  SELECT
    COUNT(*)
  FROM
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Machine m,
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Catalog c
  WHERE
    m.CatalogId = c.Id AND
    m.LifecycleState = 0 AND
    c.SessionSupport = 2 AND
    m.CurrentRegistrationState <> 1
) 'Unregistered',
(
  SELECT
    COUNT(*)
  FROM
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Machine m,
    CitrixMMMMonitoring.MonitorData.Catalog c
  WHERE
    m.CatalogId = c.Id AND
    m.LifecycleState = 0 AND
    c.SessionSupport = 2 AND
    m.IsInMaintenanceMode = 1
) 'IsInMaintenanceMode'
